title: The World's Greatest Crab Recipe
description: Grilled crab legs are brushed with garlic butter in this super simple recipe featuring snow crab clusters. Easy to make and delicious to share!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Seafood Main Dishes Crab The World's Greatest Crab Recipe 4.8 (100) 80 Reviews 14 Photos These grilled crab legs are so good. When it comes to crab, you have three options: you can go to the expensive seafood place for overpriced, bland crab; you can overcook it yourself at home, or you can follow this recipe and have crab so good you will never eat it any other way! Submitted by Dreamthief Updated on February 5, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 14 14 14 14 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings ½ cup olive oil ½ cup butter, melted ½ cup minced garlic 4 pounds Snow Crab clusters, thawed if necessary Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate. ALLRECIPES / QI AI Whisk butter, olive oil, and garlic together in a bowl until well combined; generously brush onto crab. ALLRECIPES / QI AI Cook crab on the preheated grill, turning once, until the shell just begins to brown, about 5 to 6 minutes. ALLRECIPES / QI AI Serve with lemon and more melted butter if you like, enjoy! ALLRECIPES / QI AI Editor's Note: Nutrition data for this recipe includes the full amount of garlic butter mixture. The actual amount consumed will vary. I Made It Print 166 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 957 Calories 73g Fat 6g Carbs 69g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 957 % Daily Value * Total Fat 73g 93% Saturated Fat 22g 112% Cholesterol 395mg 132% Sodium 1293mg 56% Total Carbohydrate 6g 2% Dietary Fiber 0g 1% Total Sugars 0g Protein 69g 138% Vitamin C 16mg 18% Calcium 391mg 30% Iron 4mg 19% Potassium 1165mg 25% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of The World's Greatest Crab Recipe 01 of 14 Photo by  ALLRECIPES / QI AI 02 of 14 Photo by  LovesCooking 01/28/2024 Oh boy these sea monster size crabs sure looked intimidating but they turned out to be quite easy to eat using sharp scissors to cut the shell. And when we reached the meat it was just delicious. I was actually pretty proud of myself when I saw the smiles on my guests’ faces. And the garlic butter, oh my, I could just dip my whole fridge in it! 03 of 14 Photo by  Leon Terry 09/27/2020 04 of 14 Photo by  DaisyMae 06/09/2019 Tried this based on all the compliments. Will not do again. The flavor was ok but not worth the fight to get to the meat. With the butter and oil, the legs were slippery as heck to hold and manage. We used washcloths to hold on to the legs, crack them, split open and get the meat. Never again. 05 of 14 Photo by  melody carson 05/05/2019 06 of 14 Photo by  jrbernhard 09/26/2017 07 of 14 Photo by  Marc Marquez 11/23/2016 08 of 14 Photo by  Steve Gronowski 02/01/2015 Made it with 1/2 the garlic (will use the full amount next time), but also made some skewered shrimp at the same time with the same marinade. Both were absolutely fantastic, even the kids asked for it again. 09 of 14 Photo by  yum 10/01/2014 10 of 14 Photo by  Maggie Bean 09/18/2014 I made the crab legs exactly as written, and they were a big hit with my family. We'll be using this recipe often. Thank you so much for sharing. 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Grilled Salmon Fillets with a Lemon, Tarragon, and Garlic Sauce 108 Ratings Barbequed Steelhead Trout 184 Ratings Grilled King Crab Legs Recipe 12 Ratings Simply Swordfish 92 Ratings Spicy Grilled Shrimp 1,154 Ratings Honey-Ginger Grilled Salmon 458 Ratings Lime-Marinated Grilled Salmon 126 Ratings Grilled Garlic and Herb Shrimp 388 Ratings Profanity Salmon 70 Ratings Canadian Cedar Planked Salmon 48 Ratings Maui Wowie Shrimp 66 Ratings Grilled Chicken Foil Packets 48 Ratings Garlicky Appetizer Shrimp Scampi 183 Ratings Cedar Planked Salmon 870 Ratings Grilled Tropical Tuna Steaks 48 Ratings Glazed Grilled Pork Chops 21 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
